dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains the sub-county (LEVEL5) boundaries for Uganda. The counties of Uganda are divided into sub-counties. This layer is based on 2006 data provided by Ugandan Bureau of Statistics (UBOS) and has been updated recently as Government of Uganda changed Administrative Boundaries to create some new districts in 2010. These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. Uganda Bureau of Statistics (2012) Sub-County Boundaries, Uganda, 2010. Uganda Bureau of Statistics Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/yg674hb9000 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
